Text:
Hey now! Uploading here while Demonoid is down. I will be changing trackers before long however. All info of updates on releases and where to find them @Chaser469

If you like this torrent please SEED and COMMENT.

Cheers

dude, has this been posted on demonoid in the past without me knowing? demonoid is gone, please keep posting torrents like this here, or please let the world know where you will be posting these in the future. there is not enough stern show every week to tide over my free time, i've only dreamt of a torrent like this to keep me satisfied, you are the man!!!!
These have been on noid for close to a year now, and yes I will keep anyone interested informed via twitter.

Thanks for putting these up, it's very much appreciated.

Since noid went down I have been looking for some of the sites I used to go to.

Anyone know the new hey now address? The old one is gone.
thanks but can you please upload some past Geektime episode from the past couple months? I missed them due to demonoid. grrr
